caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. MONTIE KENNETH

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 225285, Eaton CC: 99-020173-FC
On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's order of May 29, 2002, is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously.
